# Template 05 - UX Progression Run

Use this template to execute one UX slice using `docs/process/ux-progression-workflow-template.md`.

Save each run under:
- `docs/tasks/ux-progression-runs/YYYY-MM-DD-ux-<stage>-<slug>.md`

## Header

- Run ID: `UX-YYYYMMDD-<stage>-NN`
- Date:
- Stage: `A|B|C|D|E|F|G`
- Persona:
- Owner:
- Status: `in_progress | promote | iterate | defer`

## U1 - Scope Lock

- Friction statement:
- In scope:
- Out of scope:
- Acceptance criteria:
  - [ ]
  - [ ]
  - [ ]

## U2 - Baseline Capture

- Current path walkthrough:
- Baseline time to complete:
- Failure points:
- Evidence:
  -

## U3 - Design Hypothesis

- Hypothesis:
- UX change proposed:
- Expected metric movement:
  - Time-to-first-success: 
  - Stage completion rate:
  - Drop-off at this stage:

## U4 - Spec Update

- Spec files updated:
  - `docs/on-boarding/ui-workflow-mode-spec.md`
  - `docs/on-boarding/README.md` (if needed)
  - other:
- Summary of spec delta:

## U5 - Implement

- Files changed:
  -
- Notes:

## U6 - Validate

- Checklist used:
- Results:
  - [ ] Criterion 1
  - [ ] Criterion 2
  - [ ] Criterion 3
- Regressions found:

## U7 - Evidence + Parity

- Evidence links:
  -
- Docs updated:
  -
- Mock vs production note verified: `yes | no`

## U8 - Decision

- Decision: `promote | iterate | defer`
- Rationale:
- Next slice:
- Owner + target date:
